name: Much Apu About Something
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Michael Price
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Sanjay's son, Jay, turns the Kwik-E-Mart into a hip, health food market against Apu's insistence on tradition; Bart is called upon to return to his trickster life and take down the new store.
